price: 59. Sungguh, Dia (Allah) pasti akan memasukkan mereka ke tempat masuk (surga) yang mereka sukai. Dan sesungguhnya Allah Maha Mengetahui, Maha Penyantun.
arabic: لَيُدۡخِلَنَّهُم مُّدۡخَلٗا يَرۡضَوۡنَهُۥۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلِيمٌ حَلِيمٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: layud'khilannahum mud'khalan yarḍawnahu wa-inna al-laha laʿalīmun ḥalīmun
